info1: Welcome to Bus-Interchanges-HK! This is a configuration file that allows you to customize the behaviour of the program.
info2: 歡迎使用 Bus-Interchanges-HK! 本檔案能讓您調教本程式的各種設定。

settings.language_help1: Either en (English) or tc (Traditional Chinese). Simplified Chinese is not supported now.
settings.language_help2: 以上欄位需填入 en (英文）或 tc （繁體中文）。本程式暫時並不支援簡體中文。
settings.interchanges_path_help1: The filename of the interchanges file. Must be a JSON file in this folder.
settings.interchanges_path_help2: The program will display routes of all interchanges listed in this file.
settings.interchanges_path_help4: Default value is interchanges_crosshb.json which lists the three cross-harbour tunnels.
settings.interchanges_path_help5: 以上欄位需填入轉車站檔案的檔案名稱。此檔案必須是位於這個資料夾的 JSON 文件。
settings.interchanges_path_help6: 此程式運作時，將顯示這些轉車站的巴士路線。
settings.interchanges_path_help8: 預設為 interchanges_crosshb.json ，即三條過海隧道的資料。
settings.kmb_endpoint_help1: API Base URL for the KMB API. You usually don't need to change this.
settings.ctb_endpoint_help1: API Base URL for the Citybus API. You usually don't need to change this.
settings.ctb_batch_route_endpoint_help1: API Base URL for the Citybus batch route API. You usually don't need to change this.
settings.ctb_batch_eta_endpoint_help1: API Base URL for the Citybus batch ETA API. You usually don't need to change this.
